channel.title: Help with something!
channel.description:
I would like my PK Points to update when I buy or get some on my skill interface.
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2u7r5v6.png[/img]
See the PK: 7. Well I would like the number to update to my new current PK Points all the time without loggin out. Here is my method for it:
[code]public void updateRating() { sendQuest("PK: " +pkPoints+ "", 3985); }[/code]
I tried adding updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; but that didnt change anything.
Thanks !

item.title: Help with something!
item.dc:creator: @I_Hope_I I Hope I
item.description:
@I_Hope_I wrote:

I would like my PK Points to update when I buy or get some on my skill interface.

See the PK: 7. Well I would like the number to update to my new current PK Points all the time without loggin out. Here is my method for it:

public void updateRating() { sendQuest("PK: " +pkPoints+ "", 3985); }

I tried adding updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; but that didnt change anything.

Thanks !
